application.summary: A tool to create AOSC OS boot media
安同 OS 启动盘创建工具

description.p: Automatically downloads, writes, and verifies AOSC OS boot media from disk images
该工具可自动下载、写入和校验安同 OS 启动盘和系统镜像
AOSC Media Writer can also write other bootable ISOs, but keep in mind that this tool is only tested with AOSC OS images.
AOSC 启动盘制作向导亦支持写入其他可启动 ISO 文件，但本工具仅测试过安同 OS 系统镜像的写入功能。
